news.title: There’s an app for that: finding a sunny cafe in Paris, the city of light
news.summary: Jveuxdusoleil (I want sun) taps into a key part of Parisian culture: drinks on the terrasse. The app tracks the sun’s movement through the city's maze of buildings to pinpoint exactly where you can claim a sunny spot for your coffee.

news.title: All Will Rise, the game empowering players to tackle real-world problems
news.summary: All Will Rise is a card game about activism. The game is designed to inspire players to engage with issues such as pollution and the climate crisis.
